pageSetting.title: 机构存贷客户明细

attribute.value: SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZHBS'
select xtb.csz from XTB_XTCS xtb where xtb.CSMC = (case when $ywlb$ = 1 then 'CKYJGXMS' when $ywlb$ = 2 then 'DKYJGXMS' end)

select.isEqual: SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_CKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' AND dmms.DMZ=ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_DKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH,ckzh.zzh, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_CKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' AND dmms.DMZ=ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH,ckzh.zzh, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_DKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_CKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' AND dmms.DMZ=ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_DKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH,ckzh.zzh, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_CKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' AND dmms.DMZ=ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.Khdxdh ,jg.jgdh ,jg.JGMC, ckzh.KHH,dmms.DMMS KHLX, ckzh.ZHDH,ckzh.zzh, ckzh.ZHHM, ckzh.KHRQ,ckzh.KMH,ckzhmx.ZHYE FROM JXDX_DKZH ckzh INNER JOIN JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ ckzhmx ON ckzh.JXDXDH = ckzhmx.JXDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.jgdh = ckzh.jgdh INNER JOIN table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on qx.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs WHERE 1=1 and $tjrq$ BETWEEN ckzhmx.QSRQ AND ckzhmx.JSRQ and ckzh.zhbs = '$khlx$' AND ckzh.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND ckzhmx.ZHYE BETWEEN $sdyefrom$ and $sdyeto$ ORDER BY ckzhmx.ZHYE DESC ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZHBS'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select xtb.csz from XTB_XTCS xtb where xtb.CSMC = (case when $ywlb$ = 1 then 'CKYJGXMS' when $ywlb$ = 2 then 'DKYJGXMS' end)
